LSATISFY.title: Life Satisfaction
LSATISFY.question: In general, how satisfied are you with your life?

EMTSUPRT.title: Emotional Support
EMTSUPRT.question: How often do you get the social and emotional support you need?

SDLONELY.title: Loneliness
SDLONELY.question: How often do you feel lonely? Is it...

SDHEMPLY.title: Employment
SDHEMPLY.question: In the past 12 months, have you lost employment or had hours reduced?

FOODSTMP.title: Food Stamps
FOODSTMP.question: During the past 12 months, have you received food stamps, also called SNAP, the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program on an EBT card?

SDHFOOD1.title: Food Insecurity
SDHFOOD1.question: During the past 12 months how often did the food that you bought not last, and you didn’t have money to get more? Was that...

SDHBILLS.title: Bill Insecurity
SDHBILLS.question: During the last 12 months, was there a time when you were not able to pay your mortgage, rent or utility bills?

SDHUTILS.title: Utility Insecurity
SDHUTILS.question: During the last 12 months was there a time when an electric, gas, oil, or water company threatened to shut off services?

SDHTRNSP.title: Transportation Insecurity
SDHTRNSP.question: During the past 12 months, has a lack of reliable transportation kept you from medical appointments, meetings, work, or from getting things needed for daily living?

SDHSTRE1.title: Stress
SDHSTRE1.question: Within the last 30 days, how often have you felt this kind of stress? (Stress means a situation in which a person feels tense, restless, nervous, or anxious, or is unable to sleep at night because their mind is troubled all the time.)

DIABETE4.title: Diabetes
DIABETE4.question: Have you ever been told by a doctor that you have diabetes?

options.label: A member of an unmarried couple

EDUCA.title: Education Level
EDUCA.question: What is the highest grade or year of school you completed?

options.label: Never attended school or only kindergarten
College 1 year to 3 years (Some college or technical school)

RENTHOM1.title: Own or Rent Home
RENTHOM1.question: Do you own or rent your home?

CPDEMO1C.title: Has Phone
CPDEMO1C.question: How many cell phones do you have for your personal use?

VETERAN3.title: Veteran
VETERAN3.question: Have you ever served on active duty in the United States Armed Forces, either in the regular military or in a National Guard or military reserve unit?

options.label: Out of work for 1 year or more
Out of work for less than 1 year

CHILDREN.title: Children
CHILDREN.question: How many children less than 18 years of age live in your household?

INCOME3.title: Household Income
INCOME3.question: Is your annual household income from all sources:

PREGNANT.title: Pregnant
PREGNANT.question: To your knowledge, are you now pregnant?

SMOKE100.title: Smoker
SMOKE100.question: Have you smoked at least 100 cigarettes in your entire life? [Note: 5 packs = 100 cigarettes]

AVEDRNK3.title: Alcohol Consumption
AVEDRNK3.question: During the past 30 days, on the days when you drank, about how many drinks did you drink on the average?

USENOW3.title: Drug Use
USENOW3.question: Do you currently use chewing tobacco, snuff, or snus every day, some days, or not at all?

ACEDEPRS.title: Depressed
ACEDEPRS.question: Did you live with anyone who was depressed, mentally ill, or suicidal?

BIRTHSEX.title: Sex
BIRTHSEX.question: What was your sex at birth? Was it male or female?

SOFEMALE.title: Female Sexual Orientation
SOFEMALE.question: Which of the following best represents how you think of yourself?

TRNSGNDR.title: Transgender
TRNSGNDR.question: Do you consider yourself to be transgender? (If yes, ask "Do you consider yourself to be male-to-female, female-to-male, or gender non-conforming?")

ACEDRINK.title: Drunk Family
ACEDRINK.question: Did you live with anyone who was a problem drinker or alcoholic?

ACEDRUGS.title: Drugs In Family
ACEDRUGS.question: Did you live with anyone who used illegal street drugs or who abused prescription medications?

ACEDIVRC.title: Divorced Parents
ACEDIVRC.question: Were your parents separated or divorced?

_HLTHPL1.title: Health Plan
_HLTHPL1.question: Do you have any health insurance?

options.label: Do not have some form of insurance
